label: 三十六天
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: Also sanjūroku[bu no]zenshin [三十六[部]善神].  They are popular Indian deities incorporated into early Buddhism who protect believers with the assistance of countless subordinate spirits (p. 497n).
